org.sakaiproject.sms.hibernate.logic
Interface SmsMessageLogic

All Known Implementing Classes:
SmsMessageLogicImpl
public interface SmsMessageLogic

The data service will handle all sms Message database transactions for the sms tool in Sakai.

Version:
1.0
Author:
julian@psybergate.com

persistSmsMessage

void persistSmsMessage(SmsMessage smsMessage)
This method will persists the given object. If the object is a new entity then it will be created on the DB. If it is an existing entity then the record will be updated on the DB.

Parameters:
sms - Message to be persisted

getNewTestSmsMessageInstance

SmsMessage getNewTestSmsMessageInstance(java.lang.String mobileNumber,
                                        java.lang.String messageBody)
Gets the new sms message instance test. This method will instantiate and persist a SmsTask and return a SmsMessage with the associated SmsTask object set on it.

The message will not be persisted so this will need to be done manually.

Parameters:
mobileNumber - the mobile number
messageBody - the message body
Returns:
the new sms message instance test
